overview:
A technology entrepreneur and executive with over 20+ years of entrepreneurship, international management, innovation and leadership experience mainly in the Media, Technology and Banking sectors.

• GM for all US Sales, Professional Services and Account management for all clients for a UK based recommendations company • Product Management professional - conceptualizing, designing, implementing and launching/enhancing technology products to the market

Specialties Sales, Business Development, Technology Product Management, Programme Management

O’Carroll has a M.S. in Management from the Sloan Fellowship program, London Business School; and completed undergraduate studies in Computer Science at the Dublin Institute of Technology, Ireland.
